name: Red (Little Red Riding Hood)
traits: Resourceful, determined, brave, curious, independent, compassionate
background: A young girl tasked with delivering supplies to her grandmother, living near woods rumored to be dangerous
motivation: To prove her independence and protect her grandmother; to survive and overcome the wolf’s threat

name: The Wolf
traits: Cunning, deceptive, predatory, manipulative, impatient, ruthless
background: A dangerous creature capable of disguising himself as a human, driven by hunger and malice
motivation: To prey on Red and her grandmother; to satisfy his hunger and revel in his cunning

name: Grandmother
background: Red’s grandmother, living alone in an isolated house at the edge of the woods
motivation: To survive and protect her granddaughter; to escape the wolf’s trap

name: Mother
background: Red’s mother, concerned for her daughter’s safety due to strange disappearances in the woods
motivation: To keep Red safe and instill caution; to protect her family from danger

name: Woodsman
background: A local woodsman familiar with the dangers of the forest, arrives to help Red and Grandmother
motivation: To help those in danger; to rid the woods of threats; to assist the community
